app_descript:
Brief

Step into a world of creativity and relaxation with "Squishy Magic: 3D Art Coloring & DIY Toys Maker," where you can create and personalize your own squishy toys. This virtual squishy simulator lets you immerse yourself in the delightful process of designing squishies by choosing from endless color and texture combinations. Experience the tranquil pleasures of squishing and crushing them and watch as these charming toys magically regain their shapes.

  • üéµ ASMR Experience: Indulge in the oddly satisfying ASMR sounds that provide a soothing backdrop for your creative play üåü.
  • üñåÔ∏è Advanced Coloring Options: With over 200 shades and various painting tools, every squishy is a unique work of art üñçÔ∏è.
  • üéà Variety in Shapes: From adorable strawberries to kawaii unicorns and pixel-art inspired designs, there‚Äôs no shortage of shapes to inspire you üíñ.
